description:
Wars for living spaces in the deep is brutal business!
Join forces with neutral white fish and defeat all of your enemies!
Menacing bosses are also lurking in the deep!
Use your wits to defeat enemies! Aim for the shortest clear time!
Supports up to 4 players local PVP with multiple Joy-Con™ controllers!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series Fish Tornado
intro:
A simple action game that all you need is your Left Stick!
Turn your fish into a giant swarm and take down your enemies!
